## Spring Cloud Gateway 统一 API 验签、加解密

**使用密钥对**
```json
{
  "key1" : {
    "public_key" : "",
    "private_key" : ""
  },
  "key2" : {
    "public_key" : "",
    "private_key" : ""
  }
}
```

**请求数据**
```json
{
  "clientId": "abcdef123456",
  "requestId": "dad64eb4ed0ba3349a67745c14dba618db1e2cff9e2bc66d45226154634d68ea",
  "timestamp": 1657471019,
  "payload": "{\"plainText\":\"123\"}",
  "signature": ""
}
```

```console
【签名摘要】明文内容：&requestId=dad64eb4ed0ba3349a67745c14dba618db1e2cff9e2bc66d45226154634d68ea&timestamp=1657471019&clientId=abcdef123456
【签名摘要】数字摘要：7631ebc611c4217271f9cc8272293af154464998d9d33cdcd9950a7fd240dc24

【请求响应数据】{"requestId":"dad64eb4ed0ba3349a67745c14dba618db1e2cff9e2bc66d45226154634d68ea","timestamp":"1657471019","payload":"","signature":""}
【解密业务数据】null
【解密摘要签名】dd305a1c6ab7354d620f92607d8499e738275695ef5a9fd2244243ee1317f749
```

**响应数据**
```json
{
  "requestId": "dad64eb4ed0ba3349a67745c14dba618db1e2cff9e2bc66d45226154634d68ea",
  "timestamp": "1657471019",
  "payload": "",
  "signature": ""
}
```

```console
2022-07-11 00:36:59.644 DEBUG 7740 --- [ctor-http-nio-2] i.g.y.s.g.f.RequiredClientIdGlobalFilter : 【客户端】ClientDetailsProperties.ClientDetails(id=abcdef123456, name=DevClientId, , )
2022-07-11 00:36:59.645 DEBUG 7740 --- [ctor-http-nio-2] i.g.y.s.g.f.RsaEncryptionGlobalFilter    : 
【请求地址】POST /post
【请求内容】{"clientId":"abcdef123456","requestId":"dad64eb4ed0ba3349a67745c14dba618db1e2cff9e2bc66d45226154634d68ea","timestamp":1657471019,"payload":"","signature":""}
2022-07-11 00:36:59.647 DEBUG 7740 --- [ctor-http-nio-2] i.g.y.s.gateway.domain.BaseEncryption    : 
【签名摘要】明文内容：&requestId=dad64eb4ed0ba3349a67745c14dba618db1e2cff9e2bc66d45226154634d68ea&timestamp=1657471019&clientId=abcdef123456
【签名摘要】数字摘要：7631ebc611c4217271f9cc8272293af154464998d9d33cdcd9950a7fd240dc24
2022-07-11 00:36:59.979 DEBUG 7740 --- [ctor-http-nio-3] i.g.y.s.gateway.domain.BaseEncryption    : 
【签名摘要】明文内容：&requestId=dad64eb4ed0ba3349a67745c14dba618db1e2cff9e2bc66d45226154634d68ea&timestamp=1657471019&clientId=abcdef123456
【签名摘要】数字摘要：dd305a1c6ab7354d620f92607d8499e738275695ef5a9fd2244243ee1317f749
2022-07-11 00:36:59.980 DEBUG 7740 --- [ctor-http-nio-3] i.g.y.s.g.f.RsaEncryptionGlobalFilter    : 
【响应内容】{
  "args": {}, 
  "data": "{\"plainText\":\"123\"}", 
  "files": {}, 
  "form": {}, 
  "headers": {
    "Accept": "application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01", 
    "Accept-Encoding": "gzip, deflate, br", 
    "Accept-Language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9", 
    "Content-Length": "19", 
    "Content-Type": "application/json", 
    "Forwarded": "proto=http;host=\"localhost:9999\";for=\"[0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1]:47661\"", 
    "Host": "httpbin.org", 
    "Origin": "http://127.0.0.1:5500", 
    "Referer": "http://127.0.0.1:5500/", 
    "Sec-Ch-Ua": "\" Not;A Brand\";v=\"99\", \"Google Chrome\";v=\"97\", \"Chromium\";v=\"97\"", 
    "Sec-Ch-Ua-Mobile": "?0", 
    "Sec-Ch-Ua-Platform": "\"Windows\"", 
    "Sec-Fetch-Dest": "empty", 
    "Sec-Fetch-Mode": "cors", 
    "Sec-Fetch-Site": "cross-site", 
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/97.0.4692.71 Safari/537.36", 
    "X-Amzn-Trace-Id": "Root=1-62cb002b-32707ca424a6597b4f6c5089", 
    "X-Client-Id": "abcdef123456", 
    "X-Forwarded-Host": "localhost:9999"
  }, 
  "json": {
    "plainText": "123"
  }, 
  "origin": "0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1, 27.47.133.176", 
  "url": "https://localhost:9999/post"
}

【网关加密】{"requestId":"dad64eb4ed0ba3349a67745c14dba618db1e2cff9e2bc66d45226154634d68ea","timestamp":"1657471019","payload":"\u003d","signature":"\u003d\u003d"}
2022-07-11 00:36:59.982  INFO 7740 --- [ctor-http-nio-2] .g.y.s.g.f.RequestElapsedLogGlobalFilter : [/post] elapsed [338ms]
```

### TODO

- [ ] 前端支持长文本加解密，目前仅支持长度小于密钥长度的文本
- [ ] 支持 AES 加解密
